title: Round 5 Pyre Submission: Clash at Red Onyx Temple
description:
Hello my great and lovely friends! Fashionably late and here to win, we're absolutely thrilled to bring you our clash comic, A Gift of Flame. 
The comic is split into 4 separate comics, with the second and third - As Above and So Below - being interchangeable! Choose whose adventures you want to follow first before reading the other one, and then watch them all come together in the final comic!
author: Goatwright, Dracula & Hisagi, Matt, Maria/Hawthorn
